body.name: VEVA Air Purifier Large Room - ProHEPA 9000 Premium Air Purifiers for Allergies, Smoke, Dust, Pet Dander & Odor with H13 Washable Filters - White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 5 mins
features: Our high-quality, medical-grade air purifier for home use captures tiny unwanted particles traveling through your home.
Built with advanced 4-in-1 technology, our HEPA filter air purifier features a washable pre-filter, small dust & premium activated carbon filter, and a HEPA air filter.
Ideal for households with pets, smokers, or lots of cooking, our air purifiers for home (large room or small room) keep your living space odor-free.

Our HEPA air purifier does not produce trace amounts of ozone, making it a safe choice for your family. Complete with a front panel and pre-filter panel, our air purifiers for bedroom use are great for homes with a baby, cat, or dog.
Sleek and stylish, our decor-friendly air purifier with washable filter is a must-have for your home or office. Note: Replace filters every 2-6 months for optimal results.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #36,501 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #97 in HEPA Filter Air Purifiers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The high-quality Veva Pro HEPA 9000 air purifier captures unwanted micro-particles and uses HEPA technology to absorb contaminants. Offers up 3 dynamic air speeds, from Extra Quiet peaceful purification to Ultra Turbo maximum purification. Covers up to 600 sq ft.

The high-quality Veva Pro HEPA 9000 air purifier captures unwanted micro-particles and uses HEPA technology to absorb contaminants. Offers up 3 dynamic air speeds, from Extra Quiet peaceful purification to Ultra Turbo maximum purification. Covers up to 600 sq ft.

The washable pre-filter uses micro-mesh technology to remove hair, pet dander, and lint. The micro-particle & activated carbon filter extends the life of HEPA filters and uses advanced technology to eliminate odors from cooking, pets, smoking, and more! The premium H13 HEPA filter improves your air quality and removes pollen, and dust. These filters are designed to remove particles as small as 0.3 microns. Our air purifier set includes a washable pre-filter, micro-particle & activated carbon filter, and a H13 premium HEPA filter. Breathe easier in three simple steps. Installation is as easy as sliding the filters into their perfectly aligned slots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and very quite
reviews.reviewText: Love this. It really does help with keeping the dust down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed when I turned on this purifier was how quiet it was. I bought it because I had a friend visiting who has terrible allergies. It arrived in good shape and was extremely easy to assemble. It is light, easy to maneuver, and has a small footprint. Very versatile in terms of where you could put it. Just follow the provided directions to be sure you have the filters in the proper sequence. We ran the unit nonstop for 2 weeks. When I opened the unit to clean the pre-filter it had a noticeable amount of dust on it. So it was doing its job and seemed to help my friend's allergies. When it gets to be wildfire season I'm going to be especially glad to have this. I would strongly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great machine. Just beware issues with replacement filter shipping
reviews.reviewText: Got this for the new office at work. It improved the quality of the air in our unfinished environs. It has worked well.Were it not for the trouble with replacement filters I would recommend it, but for now it would be better to stick with the ProHEPA 9000.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well - quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: The cover wouldn't shut; it had to be held on with tape. Couldn't register the product, and I don't think I got the extended warranty I requested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super quiet, I highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: I have used air purifiers for many years living in Los Angeles (City of) where dirty air is an issue. I have many allergies and can suffer from the occasional bout of asthma/bronchial asthma, so an air purifier is a necessity. I bought this after reading many reviews, because the one I have is many years old and I though with newer technology an upgrade was needed. I love this product! It is whisper quiet, nice to look at and you forget it is there. I turned it on and within 2 hours could feel the difference in air quality. Very user friendly to set up and use.I did purchase replacement filters with the unit, since reviews said they can be difficult to find sometimes. And great price for this product. I've paid a lot more for others. I've only used the 2nd level clean once to clear the odor of paint, worked like a charm. I highly recommend.I use in a space of about 425 - 550 sq feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pros and cons
reviews.reviewText: This unit works really well. I can feel a noticeable difference immediately. Something about the air feels crisp now.The only issue I have is the filter needs to be replaced. Although one can be washed, it’s a series of a few filters and the one that prevents mold needed to be replaced. I thought it all could be washed.The filters are not easy to find either and costly. I needed to replace mine after 2 months, but it may be because I had water issue.In the end, I think it is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love them, I got 2 and am beyond pleased. Very quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice but smaller than expected. If it wasn’t on sale when I got it, I might would be upset for the price but since it was I’m happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: This product is not suitable for the UK market.
reviews.reviewText: This product was sold on Amazon UK but nowhere in the advert did it mention that it will only run on 120 volts AC or 12v DC. When I returned the item to seller I did mention this but got no answer. They did send a return label for UPS to send to an address in USA. I eventually got a refund only after waiting 10 days. At that point UPS tracking said it was in their lost and found centre. Very strange!
pollution par la fumée fait le travail
This machine is very quiet and seems to be working against my neighbours smoke. I do have concerns about the lack of filters though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Costly to Operate on Ongoing Basis
reviews.reviewText: The unit sets up easily and is easy to operate. However, the HEPA filters become clogged and need replacing much sooner than other air purifiers I have used. I began changing the sponge pre-filters more frequently, but this only marginally improved the HEPA filter's life. I would not recommend this unit. Although the initial outlay to purchase the unit is fairly reasonable, the cost of yearly operation comes out higher because the HEPA filters need replacement more often than other air purifiers that may cost more initially.
